00098                 protected function initialize()
00099                 {
00100                         $classname = get_class($this);
00101                         $this->name = camel_case_to_joined_lower(substr($classname, 0, strpos($classname, 'Controller')));
00102                         if (isset($_REQUEST['action']) && !empty($_REQUEST['action']))
00103                         {
00104                                 $action = basename($_REQUEST['action']);
00105                                 
00106                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $action)))
00107                                 {
00108                                         $this->action = $action;
00109                                 }
00110                                 else
00111                                 {
00112                                         $this->unknown_action();
00113                                 }
00114                         }
00115                         else
00116                         {
00117                                 $this->action = 'index';
00118                         }
00119                                 
00120                         $this->title = 'EmeRails';
00121                 }

00167                 protected function before_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00168                 {
00169                         if (is_array($filter))
00170                         {
00171                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00172                                 {
00173                                         $this->before_filter($f, $params);
00174                                 }
00175                                 return;
00176                         }
00177                         $this->before_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00178                 }
00179 
00209                 protected function after_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00210                 {
00211                         if (is_array($filter))
00212                         {
00213                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00214                                 {
00215                                         $this->after_filter($f, $params);
00216                                 }
00217                                 return;
00218                         }
00219                         $this->after_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00220                 }
00221 
00230                 private function filter_applicable($conditions)
00231                 {                       
00232                         if (is_array($conditions))
00233                         {
00234                                 // If an 'except' key exists, check that the action is not included
00235                                 if (array_key_exists('except', $conditions))
00236                                 {
00237                                         $except = $conditions['except'];
00238                                         if (is_array($except))
00239                                         {
00240                                                 return !in_array($this->action, $except);
00241                                         }
00242                                         else if ($except != $this->action)
00243                                         {
00244                                                 return TRUE;
00245                                         }
00246                                 }
00247                                 // If an 'only' key exists, check that the action is included
00248                                 else if (array_key_exists('only', $conditions))
00249                                 {
00250                                         $only = $conditions['only'];
00251                                         if (is_array($only))
00252                                         {
00253                                                 return in_array($this->action, $only);
00254                                         }
00255                                         else if ($only == $this->action)
00256                                         {
00257                                                 return TRUE;
00258                                         }
00259                                 }
00260                                 return FALSE;
00261                         }
00262                         return TRUE;
00263                 }
00264                 
00275                 protected function caches_page($page)
00276                 {

00282                                 }
00283                                 return;
00284                         }
00285                         $this->pages_cached[] = $page;
00286                 }

00327                 protected function cached_page_filename()
00328                 {
00329                         $lang = isset($_COOKIE['hl']) && !empty($_COOKIE['hl']) ? $_COOKIE['hl'] : 'en';
00330                         $id = isset($_REQUEST['id']) ? ('@' . $_REQUEST['id']) : '';
00331                         $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../caches/' . $this->name . '/' . $this->action . $id . '-' . $lang . '.cached';
00332                         return $cachefile;
00333                 }

00340                 protected function expire_cached_page($params)
00341                 {
00342                         $controller = isset($params['controller']) ? $params['controller'] : $this->name;
00343                         $action = isset($params['action']) ? $params['action'] : $this->action;
00344                         $id = isset($params['id']) ? ('@' . $params['id']) : '';
00345                         
00346                         $langs = Localization::$languages;
00347                         
00348                         foreach ($langs as $lang)
00349                         {
00350                                 $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../caches/' . $controller . '/' . $action . $id . '-' . $lang . '.cached';
00351                                 @unlink($cachefile);
00352                         }
00353                 }

00367                 protected function redirect_to($params)
00368                 {
00369                         if (is_array($params))
00370                         {
00371                                 $URL = sprintf("http://%s%s",
00372                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00373                                         $this->url_to($params));
00374                                 if (!isset($params['after']))
00375                                 {
00376                                         $this->response->add_header('Location', $URL);
00377                                         $this->response->flush();
00378                                 }
00379                                 else
00380                                 {
00381                                         $this->response->add_header('Refresh', $params['after'] . ';url=' . $URL);
00382                                 }
00383                         }
00384                         else
00385                         {
00386                                 $this->response->add_header('Location', $params);
00387                                 $this->response->flush();
00388                         }
00389                 }

00396                 protected function refresh($amount = 10)
00397                 {

00411                 {

00417                         {
00418                                 $this->redirect_to($or_else);
00419                         }

00437                 public function link_to($text, $params = array())
00438                 {
00439                         $params['href'] = isset($params['href']) ?
00440                                 $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00441                         
00442                         unset($params['action']);
00443                         unset($params['controller']);
00444                         unset($params['id']);
00445                         unset($params['query_string']);
00446                         
00447                         print a($text, $params);
00448                 }

00462                 public function link_to_remote($text, $params = array())
00463                 {
00464                         $params['href'] = !empty($params['href']) ? $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00465                         $params['remote_url'] = !empty($params['remote_url']) ? $params['remote_url'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00466                         // Ajax magic
00467                         $params['onclick'] = "$('#{$params['target']}').html('<div class=\"loading\"><span>" . l('Loading...') . "</span></div>').load('{$params['remote_url']}'); return false";
00468                         
00469                         unset($params['action']);
00470                         unset($params['controller']);
00471                         unset($params['id']);
00472                         unset($params['target']);
00473                         unset($params['remote_url']);
00474                         
00475                         print a($text, $params);
00476                 }

00527                 function url_to_myself($relative = TRUE)
00528                 {

00531                                 $url :

00533                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],

00552                 public function make_relative_url($params)
00553                 {
00554                         $controller = (!isset($params['controller']) || empty($params['controller'])) ?
00555                                 $this->name : $params['controller'];
00556                         $type = (isset($params['type']) && !empty($params['type'])) ?
00557                                 $params['type'] : $this->type;
00558                         if (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action']))
00559                         {
00560                                 if (isset($params['id']) && !empty($params['id']))
00561                                 {
00562                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s/%s',
00563                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00564                                                 $controller,
00565                                                 $params['action'],
00566                                                 $params['id']);
00567                                 }
00568                                 else
00569                                 {
00570                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s.%s',
00571                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00572                                                 $controller,
00573                                                 $params['action'],
00574                                                 $type);                                 
00575                                 }
00576                         }
00577                         else
00578                         {
00579                                 $href = sprintf('%s%s/index.%s',
00580                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00581                                         $controller,
00582                                         $type);                         
00583                         }
00584                         if (isset($params['query_string']))
00585                         {
00586                                 $href .= '?' . $params['query_string'];
00587                         }
00588                         if (isset($params['hash']))
00589                         {
00590                                 $href .= '#' . $params['hash'];
00591                         }
00592                         return $href;
00593                 }
00594                 
00617                 public function render($params)
00618                 {
00619                         if ($this->rendered)
00620                         {
00621                                 return;
00622                         }
00623                         // Initialize rendered content
00624                         $rendered = NULL;
00625                         if ($params === NULL)
00626                         {
00627                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00628                         }
00629                         else if (isset($params['partial']))
00630                         {
00631                                 $partial = basename($params['partial']);
00632                                 
00633                                 // Get part file
00634                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../views/' . $this->name . '/_' . $partial . '.php';
00635                                 
00636                                 // Connect main object
00637                                 if (isset($params['object']))
00638                                 {
00639                                         eval("\${$partial} = \$params['object'];");
00640                                 }
00641                                 else if (isset($this->$partial))
00642                                 {
00643                                         eval("\${$partial} = \$this->{$partial};");
00644                                 }
00645                                 
00646                                 // Start output buffering
00647                                 ob_start();
00648                                 
00649                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00650                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00651                         
00652                                 // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00653                                 $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00654                         }
00655                         else
00656                         {
00657                                 // Get action to render
00658                                 $action = (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action'])) ? 
00659                                         basename($params['action']) : $this->action;
00660                                         
00661                                 // Get part file
00662                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../views/' . $this->name . '/' . $action . '.php';
00663                                 
00664                                 // Start output buffering
00665                                 ob_start();
00666                                 
00667                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00668                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00669                                 
00670                                 // Get buffer contents
00671                                 $this->content_for_layout = ob_get_contents();
00672                                 // Backwards compatibility
00673                                 $this->page_content = $this->content_for_layout;
00674                                 
00675                                 // Clean output buffer
00676                                 ob_end_clean();
00677                                 
00678                                 if (isset($params['layout']) && $params['layout'] == FALSE ||
00679                                         isset($_REQUEST['nolayout']))
00680                                 {
00681                                         // Do not print layout
00682                                         $rendered = $this->content_for_layout;
00683                                 }
00684                                 else
00685                                 {
00686                                         $rendered = $this->render_layout($params);
00687                                 }
00688                                 
00689                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00690                         }
00691                         
00692                         if (isset($params['return']))
00693                         {
00694                                 return $rendered;
00695                         }
00696                         else
00697                         {
00698                                 print $rendered;
00699                         }
00700                 }
00701 
00710                 public function render_as_string($params)
00711                 {
00712                         $params['return'] = TRUE;
00713                         return $this->render($params);
00714                 }

00725                 protected function render_layout($params)
00726                 {
00727                         $layout = isset($params['layout']) && !empty($params['layout']) ?
00728                                 basename($params['layout']) : $this->name;
00729                                 
00730                         // Initialize rendered content
00731                         $rendered = NULL;
00732                         
00733                         // Start output buffering
00734                         ob_start();
00735                         
00736                         // Get part file
00737                         $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../views/layouts/' . $layout . '_layout.php';
00738                         if (!file_exists($partfile))
00739                         {
00740                                 // Fall back to default layout
00741                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../views/layouts/default_layout.php';
00742                         }
00743                         
00744                         // Evaluate and send to buffer
00745                         print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00746                 
00747                         // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00748                         $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00749                         
00750                         return $rendered;
00751                 }
00752 
00764                 public function render_page()
00765                 {
00766                         // Process before filters queue
00767                         foreach ($this->before_filters as $before_filter)
00768                         {
00769                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($before_filter[1]))
00770                                 {
00771                                         $filter = $before_filter[0];
00772                                         $this->$filter();
00773                                 }
00774                         }
00775 
00776                         // If the page should be cached, verify if it exists in the cache
00777                         if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached) &&
00778                                         $this->cached_page_exists())
00779                         {
00780                                 $cached_file = $this->cached_page_filename();
00781                                 if (isset($this->mimetype))
00782                                 {
00783                                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00784                                 }
00785                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Length', filesize($cached_file));
00786                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($cached_file);
00787                         }
00788                         else
00789                         {                       
00790                                 // Start buffering
00791                                 ob_start();
00792                         
00793                                 // Call eventual controller action
00794                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $this->action)))
00795                                 {
00796                                         $this->{$this->action}();
00797                                 }
00798                                 else
00799                                 {
00800                                         HTTP::error(500);
00801                                 }
00802                                 // Call render on the controller
00803                                 // This won't have effect if the controller has already rendered
00804                                 $this->render($_REQUEST);
00805 
00806                                 // Get response body, clean output buffer
00807                                 $this->response->body .= ob_get_clean();
00808                                 
00809                                 // Conversely, if the page should be cached, store it in cache
00810                                 if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached))
00811                                 {
00812                                         $caches_dir = dirname($this->cached_page_filename());
00813                                         if (!file_exists($caches_dir))
00814                                         {
00815                                                 mkdir($caches_dir, 0700, true);
00816                                         }
00817                                         file_put_contents($this->cached_page_filename(), $this->response->body);
00818                                 }
00819                         }
00820                         
00821                         // Process after filters queue
00822                         foreach ($this->after_filters as $after_filter)
00823                         {
00824                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($after_filter[1]))
00825                                 {
00826                                         $filter = $after_filter[0];
00827                                         $this->$filter();
00828                                 }
00829                         }
00830                         
00831                         if (isset($this->mimetype))
00832                         {
00833                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00834                         }
00835                         
00836                         // Finally, flush responses
00837                         $this->response->flush($this->request->is_head());
00838                 }
00839 
00851                 public function render_component($params)
00852                 {
00853                         // Merge request and user parameters
00854                         $_GET = array_merge($_GET, $params);
00855                         
00856                         // If a controller is not set, use current controller
00857                         if (!isset($params['controller']))
00858                         {
00859                                 $controller_name = $this->name;
00860                         }
00861                         else
00862                         {
00863                                 // Use the value stored in params as controller name
00864                                 $controller_name = basename($params['controller']);
00865                                 
00866                                 // Include the controller class file
00867                                 require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . '/../controllers/' . $controller_name . '_controller.php');
00868                                 
00869                                 // Load localization table
00870                                 Localization::add_strings_table($controller_name);
00871                         }
00872                         
00873                         // Create class name
00874                         $classname = joined_lower_to_camel_case($controller_name) . 'Controller';
00875                         
00876                         // Instantiate controller
00877                         $controller = new $classname();
00878                         
00879                         // Unset controller key from params (why?)
00880                         unset($params['controller']);
00881                         
00882                         // Set requested action
00883                         if (isset($params['action']))
00884                         {
00885                                 $action = basename($params['action']);
00886                                 
00887                                 $controller->action = $action;
00888                         }
00889                         
00890                         // Invoke action method
00891                         $controller->$action();
00892                         
00893                         // Request rendering with no layout
00894                         $params['layout'] = FALSE;
00895                         
00896                         // Note that this could already have been called
00897                         $controller->render($params);
00898                 }
00899 
00906                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00907                 {
00908                         if (!file_exists($filename))
00909                         {
00910                                 HTTP::error(500);
00911                         }
00912                         $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00913                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00914                 }
00915 
00922                 protected function strip_external_php_tags($php_code)
00923                 {
00924                         if (($start = strpos($php_code, '<?php')) === 0)
00925                         {
00926                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, $start + strlen('<?php'));
00927                         }
00928                         else
00929                         {
00930                                 $php_code = "?>\n" . $php_code;
00931                         }
00932                         if (($end = strrpos($php_code, '?>')) === strlen($php_code) - strlen('?>'))
00933                         {
00934                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, 0, strrpos($php_code, '?>'));
00935                         }
00936                         else
00937                         {
00938                                 $php_code = $php_code . "\n<?php\n";
00939                         }
00940                         return $php_code;
00941                 }

01004                 protected function compress()
01005                 {
01006                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) &&
01007                                 preg_match("/(x-gzip|gzip)/", $_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'], $matches))
01008                         {
01009                                 $this->response->body = gzencode($this->response->body, 9);
01010                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Encoding', $matches[1]);
01011                         }
01012                 }
01013         }
